about_the_game:
Monster experimentation and facility management. SCP: Foundation Simulator is a strategic simulation game where the player oversees an organization dedicated to containing and experimenting on supernatural phenomena. Based on the popular SCP-Foundation.

"You play your little games. You finally get all of us. But then what happens?"




Construct your facility from the ground up! Place new floor-tiles to expand your site and decorate it with the fanciest of office plants. You will be able to build on a maximum of 4 floors vertically.


A wide variety of SCPs get sent to your facility overtime as you level up. You need to prepare the right containment cell that best fits the anomalies' descriptions and attributes. After the SCPs have been contained you must experiment on them in the name of science!


Expand your wallet with workers, invest in better tools and structures to further your site. Become economically independent and stable!


Workers need to have some living standards! You can't let these creatures get out! The toilets are clogged!
You will need to manage a lot of different aspects in your facility. Such as the health, sanity, and hunger of all your employees as well as keeping anomalies far away from civilization. Try to minimize fatalities and casualties through risk management.


Be prepared for bloodshed. Without proper management and precautions, you will eventually run into a breach. A breach can occur either from an SCP breaking containment or groups-of-interest that are trying to infiltrate your site. These breaches can usually be solved by calling on an MTF-squad to aid you.


  • SCP 079
  • SCP 096
  • SCP 106
  • SCP 173
  • SCP 939
  • SCP 999

content_descriptors.notes: The game features characteristics and scenes of blood, gore, and graphic dismemberment. This includes audio such as screams, gunfire, and other sounds that some may find unpleasant. It also explores mature story themes, including terrorism, experiments and various lethal situations which are intended for mature audiences. We advise individuals who have experienced traumatic events, sensitive to load noises or flashing lights/images to refrain from playing SCP: Foundation Simulator.
